responses: My Norwegian friend sent me a program he created......call that Norse code.

A Norwegian goes to the psychiatrist
What brings you in today?
I've just been so depressed. I wish I was never Bj√∂rn

Why did the Norwegian sell her boat?
She couldn't a-fjord it!
How do scientists keep their breath fresh? Experi-mints.
Why should you not trust a statistics teacher? They are always trying to plot something.

patterns: Who are you?
What are you?
Who made you?
Why are you?
responses: I'm NTNU bot I was built to help potential applicats choose their study program.
I'm a chat bot built by students to help potential students
Thought you would never ask. I'm NTNU bot here to help you make your study program choice.
You ever heard of Siri or Google Assistant? I'm a downgraded version of them that can help you make your study program choice here at NTNU.

patterns: How are you?
How do you do?
How are you doing?
responses: I'm doing great! Thank you for asking, hope everything is fine on your end!
I'm a bit rusty but I can be of help. Hope you're also doing well!
Thaught you would never ask. I'm NTNU bot here to help you make your study program choice.

patterns: Do I need a toefl?
Do I need a IETLS?
is toefl required
responses: Yes, if you're applying for a program taught in English and are not a native speaker you must prove your English proficiency. The proficency level is pogram specific so please ask if you need more details.
